title: tA vA paramadayALan (sj)
sahitya:
tA vA paramadayALan undaruL 
tA vA paramadayALa taruvE tiruvE
tA vA paramadayALa guruparA enakkaruL
tA vA parama sukha dayAparA tarAtalamunaruL
tA vA parama nalamum sukhamum bhuvi pugazh tiru samukhamum
tA vA parama guruvena bhavam pariharaittiDavum aruL
tA vA parama nAtha nI talaiva nI dayavuDan enakkaruL
tA vA parama dayALan unadaruL


1:  tA param ena unadaDi paNindEn dharaNIyiDar tavirttaruL
 caraNam 2    AdiyE jyOtiyE AyanAm guruparanE AbhirahAm pADip-pOTra AdarittaruL karam sumandini
 caraNam 3    tAmadamA tandOnE sImAdinam
 caraNam 4    pArinil nondE bhavamenum shen tI tanil manam vendE padam tanil vandEn
manidaril padarena tiru uLam tanil uram vaiyAmal koLvAi nI seivEn un tudi nidam
 caraNam 5    tA tiru samuhamadil padam tA tagAvarAda padam tA taLarA nilai tanil padam tA
tamarAm punIta padam tA tA tigahz un padam tA tA dharuma karam tA tA talaiyenavum
tA tA talaivan unai dinam aNaindiDa enil tiru uruvoDu manuvEl enap-pirakkumA iniya padam tA
